mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gradeGuide (gradeGuideNum, subject, content, hitCount, saveFilename, originalFilename, reg_date, modify_date, showGradeGuide, schoolId, categoryId) VALUES (gradeGuide_seq.nextval, #{subject}, #{content}, #{hitCount}, #{saveFilename}, #{originalFilename}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{showGradeGuide}, #{schoolId}, #{categoryId})
mapper.update: UPDATE gradeGuide SET subject = #{subject}, content = #{content}, hitCount = #{hitCount}, saveFilename = #{saveFilename}, originalFilename = #{originalFilename}, modify_date = SYSDATE, showGradeGuide = #{showGradeGuide}, categoryId = #{categoryId} WHERE gradeGuideNum = #{gradeGuideNum}
mapper.select: SELECT gradeGuideNum, subject, content, hitCount, saveFilename, originalFilename, TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS reg_date, TO_CHAR(modify_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS modify_date, showGradeGuide, schoolId, categoryId FROM gradeGuide WHERE gradeGuideNum = #{gradeGuideNum}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT gradeGuideNum, subject, content, hitCount, saveFilename, originalFilename, TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS reg_date, TO_CHAR(modify_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS modify_date, showGradeGuide, schoolId, categoryId FROM gradeGuide
AND gradeGuideNum < #{gradeGuideNum}
AND subject LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY gradeGuideNum DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT gradeGuideNum, subject, content, hitCount, saveFilename, originalFilename, TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS reg_date, TO_CHAR(modify_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS modify_date, showGradeGuide, schoolId, categoryId FROM gradeGuide
AND gradeGuideNum > #{gradeGuideNum}
AND subject LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY gradeGuideNum ASC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
